MOD_DAMAGE_BOOST.description: Boots the base power of a skill.

MOD_EFFICIENCY.description: Lowers the base cost of a skill.

MOD_OVERCLOCK.description:
Doubles the base power
AND cost of a skill.

MOD_BESERK.description:
Greatly increases the crit rate
of a skill, but lowers accuracy.

MOD_ACCURACY.description: Boosts the base accuracy of a skill.

MOD_MULTI_TARGET.description:
Makes a skill target all enemies at once.
Accuracy is reduced and cost is increased.
